name: New features and bug fixes
body:
- httplib.h: support LibreSSL (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1922)
- Resolve https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/issues/1906
- Fix https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/issues/1379
- **Breaking change**: Made default server and client read/write timeout settings separately
- Fix https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/issues/1923
- Fix https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/issues/1796
- Issue1431 (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1926)

name: Bug fixes
body:
- Accessing Directory #1389
- ‘constexpr’ error (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1918)
- Only match path params that span full path segment (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1919)
- Fix KeepAliveTest.SSLClientReconnectionPost problem (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1921)

name: Bug fixes and improvements
body:
- [Fix incorrect handling of Expect: 100-continue](https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/commit/7196ac8a07100da06cfe278719a5b96a1ddfee1b)
- [Peformance improvement by removing tolower function call](https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/commit/b4989130da0d0eef80b16d18bac6d96e99ad369d)

name: Bug fixes
body:
- Windows: simplify conditional compilation and fix call to CreateFileMappingW
- Fix Incorrect usage of urls ending without '/' in static file server (Windows only) https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/issues/1848
- Header parser incorrectly accepts NUL and CR within header values #1908
- Fix problem with Abstract Namespace Unix Domain
- Fix SIGINT problem in Docker image

name: New features and Bug fixes
body:
- Changed CPPHTTPLIB_KEEPALIVE_MAX_COUNT to 100
- Add Dockerfile for static file server
- **Breaking Change!:** get_header_ methods on Request and Response now take…
- Add sleep in handle_EINTR
- Fix https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/issues/1645
- Fix https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1788
- Added set_ipv6_v6only method (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1905)

- Fixed set_connection_timeout() unexpected results (#1878)
- Fix KeepAliveTest.SSLClientReconnectionPost (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1895)

name: Some new features
body:
* threadsafe CLOEXEC on platforms that support it
* BoringSSL compatibility fixes (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1892)

* detail::is_socket_alive() is not work for https connection #1481
* avoid memory leaks if linked with static openssl libs (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1857)
* Allow hex for ipv6 literal addr in redirect (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1859)
* Fix build on Windows with no WINAPI_PARTITION_APP support (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1865)
* test: fix GetRangeWithMaxLongLength on 32 bit machines (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1867)
* Fix build when targeting Windows 7 as platform. (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1869)
* Require a minimum of TLS 1.2 (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1889)

name: Bug fixes
body: https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/compare/v0.15.3...v0.16.0

name: Bug fix
body: - Breaking change in handling requests with Range in v0.15.1 and v0.15.2 #1772

name: Bug fix
body: - Severe directory traversal vulnerability (dotdotslash) #1768

name: Bug fix
body: - Malicious requests for many overlapping byte ranges of large files risk OOM #1766

name: Some new features and bug fixes
body:
- Add missing #include for strcasecmp #1744
- ThreadPool: optional limit for jobs queue (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1741)
- Fix #1628 (OpenSSL 1.1.1 End of Life on September 11, 2023)
- Fix Windows std::max macro problem #1750
- Fix select() return code for fd >= 1024 (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1757)
- Add a getter for a bearer token from a request (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1755)
- Support move semantics for Response::set_content() (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1764)
- Treat paths with embedded NUL bytes as invalid (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1765)
- Fix usage of rand() is not seeded and depends on seeding by parent program #1747
- Fix check request range and fix response Content-Range. #1694

name: Bug fixes
body:
- Fix: Query parameter including query delimiter ('?') not being parsed properly (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1713)
- Fix https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/issues/1736
- Fix https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/issues/1665
- Change some of status messages based on RFC 9110 (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1740)
- Add StatusCode enum (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1739)
- Fix https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/issues/1738

name: Bug fixes
body:
- Fix https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/issues/1685
- Fix https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/issues/1724

name: New feature
body: - Add optional user defined header writer #1683

name: Bug fix and breaking change
body:
Bug fixes:
- Fix CPPHTTPLIB_ALLOW_LF_AS_LINE_TERMINATOR (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1634)
- Avoid a -Warray-bounds false positive in GCC 13. (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1639)

Breaking change:
- Fix https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/issues/1638

name: New features and bug fixes
body:
- Removed unnecessary CRLF at the end of multipart ranges data
- Fix https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1559
- Use memory mapped file for static file server (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1632)

name: Bug fixes
body:
- Fix https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1519
- Fix https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/issues/1590 (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1630)
- Fix https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/issues/1619
- Fix https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1624

name: Bug fix
body: - Compiler freezes on Debian 10 (buster) with GCC 8.3.0 #1613

name: Some new features and bug fixes
body:
- Don't overwrite the last redirected location (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1589) # This is a breaking change.
- Fix https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/issues/1607
- Add named path parameters parsing (Implements https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/issues/1587) (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1608)
- Result: allow default constructor (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1609)

name: Some new features
body:
- Add support for zOS (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1581)
- Provide a CMake option to disable C++ exceptions (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1580)
- Load in-memory CA certificates (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1579)

name: Add HTTPLIB_INSTALL CMake option
body: Add HTTPLIB_INSTALL CMake option (#1575)

name: Fix more CRLF injection problems
body: Fix more CRLF injection problems.

name: Bug fixes
body:
- Don't loading system certs from Keychain on iOS (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1546)
- Initialize sockaddr_un to fix valgrind uninitialised byte message. (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1547
- https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1547)
- Using set_content_provider with length of 0 makes it infinitely loop #1545
- How to check if server is running successfully in another thread? #1548
- Fix leaked handle in create_socket (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1554)

name: Bug fixes
body:
- Fix "Location" header url corrupted by percent-unescaping in redirect… #1459
- Trailing headers not handled #1486
- SSL access through a proxy causes SIGSEGV #1533

name: Some new features and bug fixes
body:
- System certs support on macOS (#1474)
- Add Request::get_file_values method (#1495)
- Fix: assert socket_requests_are_from_thread_ std::this_thread::get_id() (#1498)
- Fix: multipart Content-Type headers with both boundary and charset parameters (#1516)

name: Update including breaking change
body:
- Removed is_writable() from DataSink (Resolve https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1478, too) (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1483) - This is a breaking change.
- add to_human_string (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1467)
- Issue 52666: cpp-httplib:server_fuzzer: Timeout in server_fuzzer

name: Some updates
body:
* Support LOCAL_ADDR and LOCAL_PORT header in client Request (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1450)
* Add EINTR and EAGAIN judge for accept (https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib/pull/1438)
* Add support for requests with both MultipartFormDataItems and Content Providers (#1454)

name: Bug fixes
body:
- duration_to_sec_and_usec narrowing #1426
- EXCEPTION_WHAT is not set if exception text contains newlines #1437
- Windows CMake directory install fix #1434
- Post function donnot have the implement which only has path, header #1421
- undef poll at the end if CPPHTTPLIB_USE_POLL #1427
- Get client process id over ip/port when server runs on UNIX socket. #1418
- avoid lockup in ThreadPool::shutdown() on legacy host #1417
- upport compilation on AIX #1402
